field.name: summary
field.value: New build scripts to release Binder

field.name: description
field.value: These are the new script required to release the Binder Component.

comment.author: rbellamy
comment.text: Is there a particular reason why you added the castle-project-binder project to the top of the main default.build?

comment.author: rbellamy
comment.text: And wouldn't this mean that the \buildscripts directory should be added to the trunk as an svn:external?

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text:
Richard,
As part of releasing projects, we are now moving them to the root of the svn tree to separate them and make it easier for future releases. You can catch up on that discussion here: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/browse_thread/thread/a4fb49a463ff3d33 If you need more info send me or Jonathon Rossi a pvt message.

comment.author: rbellamy
comment.text: Never mind... I see that your patches are predicated on the idea that I will split the Binder component into its own separate branches/tags/trunk within SVN.

comment.author: rbellamy
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''1.1.0''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
